subject: Cartoons and Cartoonists
Wrestling
Comic Books and Strips
Books and Literature
Graphic Novels
lead_paragraph: Standing more than 7 feet tall and weighing more than 500 pounds, the professional wrestler Andre the Giant is the subject of a new graphic novel by cartoonist Box Brown.
snippet: Standing more than 7 feet tall and weighing more than 500 pounds, the professional wrestler Andre the Giant is the subject of a new graphic novel by cartoonist Box Brown.
